source_objects.title: Management
source_objects.description: Take your management skills to the next level with these course in negotiation, leadership, people management and more.

items.title: The Art of Being a Soccer Agent
items.headline: Keys to excelling in a fascinating profession
objectives_summary: You will know not only WHAT this profession is about but you will also learn HOW to face it
You will know the profession most important variables
You will know the obstacles you face, and you will have the tools to overcome them

items.title: Restaurant leadership: 12 qualities of leaders
items.headline: Expand your leadership and grow a company culture that brings results
objectives_summary: How to be an efficient leader for your team in the restaurant industry
What are important principles to ensure that your are credible to your team
How to drive engagement from your employees

items.title: The Procurement; Policy & Procedure
items.headline: The Procurement; Policy & Procedure
objectives_summary: Be able to know the required contents for setting up policy & procedure for the Procurement as the infrastructure for the Procurement function
Be able to execute the Procurement policy & procedure successfully
Procurement transactions are well managed and controlled systematically

items.title: Quality Management Systems, Tools and Strategies
items.headline: The 1-stop solution for a grounded onboarding in quality management
objectives_summary: a grounded general understanding of quality management systems, tools and strategies, including:
History of Quality Management
Process Management

items.title: Bar & Hospitality Management Training Course
items.headline: Take the next step
objectives_summary: Bar Management
Hospitality Management
Hospitality Progression

items.title: Professional Diploma in Human  Resource Management
items.headline: Basics in HRM
objectives_summary: Define what Human Resources Management is.
Describe the practices to find and hire the best employees.
Describe training, employee recognition and discipline policies and procedures.

items.title: Learn How To Create A Safe Working Environment For Your Team
items.headline: Improve your team's environment by protecting them from conflict, accepting failure and encouraging a supportive culture
objectives_summary: How you can protect your team from outside interference and issues that might distract them from doing their work
The importance of a psychologically safe environment, within which teams feel supported and protected
Practical steps to set up a safe working environment for your team to be successful and more productive

items.title: Race, Culture And Religion In The Workplace

visible_instructors.job_title: Creating modern People Operations that work.
visible_instructors.name: Nicole
visible_instructors.title: Nicole Le Maire

items.headline: We all have different appearances, so too do we have other worldviews...
objectives_summary: Understand the relationships among Race, Culture and Religion. (diversity, justice, power)
Recognize the ways in which Race intersects with other group identifications.
Draw out the collective wisdom of inclusion.

items.title: Introduction to Financial Management
items.headline: It is the art and science of managing finance. It is the essential requirement of any organized business
objectives_summary: Explain What is Financial Management
List the Objectives of Financial Management
Explain the Various Elements of Financial Management

items.title: Oil and Gas Management Fundamentals
items.headline: Get an in-depth knowledge of the oil & gas industry and the responsibilities of this industry at the management level.
objectives_summary: Understand the role and responsibilities at the management level in the oil and gas industry
Gain the skills to plan, control and manage projects in the oil and gas industry
Know how to develop, manage and lead teams effectively, setting shared organizational goals

items.title: Coach your team like a PRO

visible_instructors.job_title: Leadership Coach, Business Trainer, Team Leader
visible_instructors.name: Gergana
visible_instructors.title: Gergana Nikolova

items.headline: Learn how to be a better leader to your team
objectives_summary: Learn how to use coaching method in your leadership or management role
Learn how to use the best working coaching model
Learn how to organise, conduct and document 101 coaching session with a team member

items.title: Succession Planning
items.headline: Succession Planning is a dynamic ongoing business process that brings together the execution of a business plan.
objectives_summary: Explain What is Succession Planning
List the Objectives of Succession Planning
Explain the Core Principles of Succession Planning

items.title: Management Masterclass in Leading Winning Teams
items.headline: How To Apply Tools and Frameworks To Fulfil Your Team's Core Mission And Be A Better Leader of People
objectives_summary: Operate more effectively in their job roles

Utilise a set of complementary, inter-locking frameworks as tools to identify leadership behaviours and bases for exercising leadership power; and the deployment of appropriate leaders to a team’s development cycle
Analyse five behaviour modes consistently used in intra/inter-institutional relationships, and how and when to deploy those behaviour modes to protect and promote their organisation’s objectives

items.title: Acing the Consulting Case Interview

visible_instructors.job_title: Business and Technology Senior Manager, Lecturer
visible_instructors.name: Piotr
visible_instructors.title: Piotr Gawlicki

items.headline: Taught by a consulting senior manager and regular candidates interviewer. This course includes an interview simulation.
objectives_summary: What a case interview looks like - based on a simulation
What interviewers expect from candidates
Structure case answers in a logical way

items.title: Leadership A-Z: Ultimate Basic Skills For New Leaders
items.headline: How to Become an Effective Leader With the Help of  Hidden Foundations of Dynamic Leaders of 21st Century
objectives_summary: How To Significantly Improve Your Performance And Rapidly Advance Your Career
Utilizing the appropriate tools and insights to achieve desired outcomes through guiding, support, and control with significantly less effort
Distinguish between management and leadership - and why both are necessary

items.title: ISO 19011:2018 - Exam for External & Internal Auditing Skill

visible_instructors.title: S.M. WAQAS IMAM
visible_instructors.name: S.M. WAQAS
visible_instructors.job_title: Industrial Engineer | Quality, Health, Safety & Environment Professional | IRCA CQI Lead Auditor

items.headline: ISO 19011 Lead Auditor Practice Exam - Assessment to help you to validate and improve your auditing skills & experience.
objectives_summary: Sample Practice Exam based on the latest ISO 19011:2018
Self Assessment on Auditing Knowledge
Review yourself on the latest methodology of auditing
